name: Nemo's Escape From Professor Robotkin (Aug 2021)
description:
NEMO'S ESCAPE FROM PROFESSOR ROBOTKIN

Try to escape the level without touching obstacles and walls! Can you avoid them all and prevent Robotkin from being alerted? (D-Pad to move)

This was the 3rd proper game I developed, in early 2021 after a long period of time away from videogame development. I had just applied to study a MSc in Computer Games Technology to pursue a career in Game Programming, and decided to create this platformer in Unity as a learning experience. I learnt to code timed obstacles and different scripts to make each obstacle behave differently. 

The background audio playing is Kanye West - Off The Grid.
